author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three arrested for murder

Three persons were arrested by Vadaseri police for the murder of Suresh alias Gunda Suresh (38) here on Sunday.

The arrested were J. Ranjit alias Ranjitkumar (28) of Kunnavilai, E. Alex of Alexander (30) and N. Ayyappan (25) both from Vadaseri. Police are searching for a few more persons in the murder case.

All the three were remanded in judicial custody after they had been produced before a local magistrate.
title: Three arrested for murder of history-sheeter
